旴字的基本解释

旴
xù
古同“旭”。

旴
xū
〔旴江〕又称“抚河”、“汝水”，在中国江西省东部。

旴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xū］
［《廣韻》况于切，平虞，曉。］
亦作“晇1”。
(1)日始出貌。
(2)地名。指今江西省旴江（抚河）流域一带。

旴字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　旴； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页490第14
【集韻】【韻會】?匈于切，音計。日始旦也。或作晇。　又【前漢·谷永傳】故又廣旴營表。【註】晉灼曰：旴音吁，大也。

旴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
旴字的起名意思

日始出貌；地名。指今江西省旴江(抚河)流域一带。

dawn
xù
Gu Tong "Xu".
dawn
xū
[Mingjiang], also known as "Fuhe" and "Rushui", is in the eastern part of Jiangxi Province, China.
dawn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xū］
["Guangyun" Kuang Yuqi, Pingyu, Xiao. ]
Also known as "晇1".
(1) Everyday it begins to appear.
(2) Place name. Refers to the area around the Minjiang (Fuhe) drainage area in Jiangxi Province today.
dawn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji 1] [Japanese Department] 　旴; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 490 14
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Hung Yuqie, phonetic meter. The beginning of the day also. Or for night.　[Previous Han·Gu Yongzhuan] So Guangmingying table. [Note] Jin Zhuo said: Mingyinyu, Daye.
